actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to require the Federal National Mortgage Association, the Federal Home Loan Mortgage Corporation, and the Federal Housing Finance Board to study and report on the development of a secondary market for commercial real estate mortgages and to require the Resolution Trust Corporation to report on the impact of its commercial real estate securitization program.
short_title: Secondary Market for Commercial Real Estate Mortgages Act of 1992

summary.text: Secondary Market For Commercial Real Estate Mortgages Act of 1992 - Directs the Federal National Mortgage Association, the Federal Home Loan Mortgage Corporation, and the Federal Housing Finance Board to each study and report to the Congress with regard to the development of a secondary commercial real estate mortgage market. Directs the Resolution Trust Corporation to study and report to the Congress with regard to the impact of its commercial real estate securitization program.

titles.title: Secondary Market for Commercial Real Estate Mortgages Act of 1992

A bill to require the Federal National Mortgage Association, the Federal Home Loan Mortgage Corporation, and the Federal Housing Finance Board to study and report on the development of a secondary market for commercial real estate mortgages and to require the Resolution Trust Corporation to report on the impact of its commercial real estate securitization program.
